website_summaries.verdict: A handy, durable post hole digger that is tolerably priced for what it can accomplish.
pros: The reinforced fiberglass handles and 14-gauge steel blades make this a solidly built option
As great for garden work as it is for digging post holes
Comes with a limited lifetime warranty
cons: The cushioned grips could be a tad bit longer

customer_reviews.title: it did its job and deserves a raise.
customer_reviews.text: It did the job. I used this to dig 22 four foot holes. I had to cut the sides out a bit to reach but it held up and did it's job. Now it's taking up room in my garage and probably will for a lifetime even if I did 20000 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 5 size is great for 5X5 vinyl fence posts
customer_reviews.text: we do fence for a living, we go through diggers. I bought these as a test run, that 7.5 inch post hole digger has about 300 holes dug with it so far, no issues. that 7.5 size is great for 5X5 vinyl fence posts. bully tools makes excellent diggers! i'm ordering another pair today.
customer_reviews.author: -me-

customer_reviews.title: did the job though but not as good as a real welded one which allows you twist ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy bolt together piece, did the job though but not as good as a real welded one which allows you twist it in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: coalbinbob

customer_reviews.title: Good construction
customer_reviews.text: The posthole diggers are heavy, seems well constructed. My concern is that I received no information on who to contact with the limited lifetime warranty? I don't plan on having to contact them but I have busted diggers from craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: Chas Butturini

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a number of Bully Tools in the past, and these live up to my expectations. They're sturdy and well-made. The metal on the digger is thick and the welds are clean. The handles appear to be the same as the ones on their shovels, which even my crew of gorillas have never broken. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Hi Desert

customer_reviews.title: American Made
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Strong handles. Pulls plenty of soil from holes. Quality and stylish. American made tool.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Sad to see these are American made
customer_reviews.text: These are not 5.5 inches.they are not even round. Cheaply built. Sad to see these are American made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average tool. Blade alignment was off, but did ...
customer_reviews.text: Average tool. Blade alignment was off, but did the job. I would buy it again for SMALL home use only.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Performed well digging 21⁄2' hole through southwest Ohio clay. Post for Little Free Library was near driveway so clay also consisted of small stones from that installation. Will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JudyB28

customer_reviews.title: Very nice post hole digger love the handles
customer_reviews.text: Very nice post hole digger love the handles from now on will no buy nothing but bully tools
customer_reviews.author: Pictuure Perfect BoxersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool
customer_reviews.text: Used this to dig a hole with no issues. Handles seem strong enough to take some abuse. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D Lister

customer_reviews.title: Right name BULLY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to dig holes for my flower bed. They were so big and strong I am trading them to my son who is a commercial dock builder. He has a smaller pair. He is delighted to have such a heavy dudy pair, of great quality post hole diggers. Can't go wrong with these . Just don't try to dig in your flower bed. wondeful buy for my son
customer_reviews.author: Anna Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Good tool at fair price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you'd expect this to be. Have dug 2 holes and has worked beautifully to this point. Appears to be solid construction with good materials.
customer_reviews.author: Pop ina Bottle

customer_reviews.title: great for cutting roots
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, solid head, great for cutting roots. Setting 6x6 posts for a small pole barn, this digger has the mass and capacity to dig holes quick. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, soft steel, not for hard terrain.
customer_reviews.text: I've had great experience's with Bully tools before, but their post hole digger is a disappointment. It might work ok in sand or other soft dirt, but I didn't get through digging the first hole and the blades were both bent and the hinge was torqued out of alignment. The steel in this tool is soft and pliable and completely inadequate for the application. In addition the hinge and hinge stop are poorly designed, the hinge is a simple bolt that allows too much flex, which in turn causes the hinge stops to bypass each other and jam the tool. Was looking forward to another quality American made tool, but this was a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The jaws are too wide.
customer_reviews.text: These are for home owners to dig shallow holes in soft soil. Don't get me wrong, these are well made tough tools. But for digging post holes they're just too big. The jaws are really really really wide. If you want to dig an 18" hole 4' deep, look elsewhere. You won't be able to spread the handles enough on this tool. The jaws are too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Bully Tools 92382 14-Gauge 5.5-Inch Post Hole Digger with Fiberglass Handle
product_meta.description:
Size:5.5-InchBully Tools post hole diggers utilize a triple wall fiberglass, wood reinforced handle design. The super thick 12 gauge steel blades easily penetrate tough soil.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Tools made to last a lifetime, and be passed on from generation to generation. 100% Made in the USA Bully Tools is bringing back that tradition with tools built to endure years of hard labor. We have re-engineered the classic designs of shovels, rakes and other popular tools to create more efficient, durable products. Special features on specific products include true 14 gauge steel, triple wall reinforced fiberglass handles, extended length ferrules, and welded I-beam supports. We stand behind our products and offer a limited lifetime warranty. If one of our tools fails during normal use, we will replace or refund it! In a time when cheap foreign products are the norm, Bully Tools offers affordable, high quality Made in the USA goods.
